transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Good morning sir. Good morning ma'am. Rahul Rahul baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se.
Customer: Mat baat karo. Tumhe maine kitni baar bol diya ki tum log mat karo.
Executive: Ma'am service use kar rahe hain. Haan ji.
Customer: Kya hai?
Executive: Main keh raha tha ki ye service use nahi kar rahe hain to usi ke liye call karna padta hai hume kya karein.
Customer: Service use nahi kar rahe to band kar do na us service ko.
Executive: Ma'am abhi ek saal ka aapne liya hua hai service to ab usko wo to chalega hi na band kaise kar sakte hain.
Customer: Kab tak chalega?
Executive: 2026 tak May.
Customer: Theek hai fir aise hi dum chalte rehne do. Kyun efforts karun? Wahan efforts karo na jahan kuch result aayega.
Executive: Haan, theek hai lekin wo use karne pe hi to ma'am result aayega. Bina use kiye kaise result aayega?
Customer: Kya?
Executive: Main keh raha hun ki daily use karenge tabhi to kuch usme.
Customer: [inaudible] main keh rahi hun. Dekho maine tumhe to bahut kuch bheja tha. Maine to video recording bhi bheji. Sab bheja tha na maine tumhe?
Executive: Haan haan bheja hua tha.
Customer: Hai na to wahi ho na?
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Aur maine kaha tha ki dekho main tumhe recording bhejungi aur uske baad tum mujhe kabhi phone mat karna. Hai na ye baat hui thi na apni?
Executive: Haan haan yahi baat hui thi.
Customer: Aur maine tumhe recording bheji. Dono fake inquiry thi. Tumne mere ko do teen inquiry dikhai thi. Maine do teen inquiry ki recording bhej di. Teeno fake thi.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: To yaar how could I waste my time like this yaar? Nahi hota. Mere paas itni manpower nahi hai.
Executive: Main wahan apna focus lagaun kya jahan pe jahan pe mere ko fruit lage na ki haan chal yahan se to mera ROI nikal jayega, kuch to niklega. Par wahan kaise lagaun main jisme mahine mein ek niklega? Nahi yaar.
Customer: Samajhna matlab mere ko to wo smartly play karna padega na. 24 hi ghante hain isme se mujhe kya kya karna hai. Main wahan zyada focus karun jahan se mera kuch niklega result.
Executive: Nahi wo to badi baat hai. 24 ghante mein aap 5-10 minute to use kar sakti hain na.
Customer: Kyun karun main waste kyun karun main 5-10 minute bata.
Executive: Ma'am leads leads consume karenge usme se deal hoga hi hoga aisa to hai nahi ki deal nahi hoga.
Customer: Haan daily daily fake inquiry aayenge. Daily fake inquiry aayegi to daily fake inquiry pe time waste karo to mood aur kharab ho jata hai. Banda demotivate ho jata hai ye kya kar raha hun main.
Executive: Hmm. Nahi nahi aapki baat sahi hai lekin pichle last time bhi aisi baat hui thi to ab main bhi manager se apne bola tha ki dekhiye unhone aisa recording bheja hua hai kisi ka to unse baat nahi ho rahi hai wo bol rahe hain fake hai ye hua hai. Keh rahe hain ki unko bolo proper use kare proper jab use nahi kar rahi hain is wajah se aisa ja raha hoga leads unke paas. Jab use karne lagenge.
Customer: Isko bande ne inquiry dali hai to kyun dali hai?
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Main IndiaMART mere bache to IndiaMART mein nahi jate. Jo dumb log hain wo IndiaMART mein nahi jate wo Instagram pe jate.
Executive: Bilkul.
Customer: Theek hai jisko zarurat hai wahi IndiaMART ya Justdial is pe jayega.
Executive: Bilkul.
Customer: Aur wo itni fake inquiry ka ye matlab hai ki IndiaMART wale ya Justdial wale khud hi jaan bujh ke aisa kar rahe hain. Unhone apna bande bitha rakhe ki bhai tum fake inquiry dalte raho taki banda unko dekhta rahega aur unko raazi feel hota rahega ki haan bhai inquiry aa rahi hai.
Executive: Baat ye hoti hai na ki.
Customer: Agar Instagram ki inquiry hoti na to main samajh jati ki log aise velle baithe hote hain chalo fun ke liye koi inquiry dal di. But this is not Instagram this is IndiaMART yahan koi nahi aata hai. Yahan sirf kaam wale log hi aate hain. Specific jinke dimag mein hota hai ki mujhe ye cheez leni hai to main search karta hun unko. That's it.
Executive: Ek baar aap.
Customer: Koi chhote bache nahi likhte hain kabhi bhi.
Executive: Haan ek baar aap mere manager se baat karengi kya? Ek baar kar lijiye unse.
Customer: Manager ko recording bhej deti hun na.
Executive: Nahi maine to recording sunaya tha unko.
Customer: Fir kya hua? Kya jawab tha unka? Ki algorithm algorithm proper use nahi kar rahe hain. Algorithm ka funda jab hota hai suno ki quantity kam le raha hai chalo mera client bol raha hai ki ek chahiye madam. Dusra client bol raha hai ki chalo do chahiye madam bas mujhe. Aur fir main mana kar dun unko.
Customer: Par algorithm jab ho na kaam algorithm abhi kya kaam karega jab inquiry hi fake hai bilkul zero inquiry hai. Wo related hi nahi hai mere se. Chalo ki cycle fir bhi related hoti wo chalo usko fork chahiye hota. Par unhone galti se frame inquiry dal di to bhi samajh mein aata mujhe.
Customer: Par mere bache ne dal diya tha ji. Aisa to ho hi nahi sakta bhai ye logical hai hi nahi.
Executive: Dekhiye kya hota hai na ki IndiaMART pe agar kisi ko product ke bare mein janna bhi hota hai to wo bhi dal dete hain to wo bhi hamare liye wo leads ban jati hai to wo aa jati hai leads mein.
Customer: Kya lagta hai 12 saal ka bacha IndiaMART mein dalega?
Executive: Nahi 12 saal ka bacha to nahi dalega lekin aapne jinse bhi baat kiya to wo 12 saal ke bache to the nahi ma'am.
Customer: Nahi mere bache ne galti se dal diya tha yahi to bol rahe the wo log shayad.
Executive: Hmm. Kya bol rahe the wo log?
Executive: Nahi IndiaMART pe mere bache ne galti se dal diya tha.
Executive: Nahi wo to dekhiye agar wo kya hota hai na ki agar purani leads hoti hain wo consume karne pe aisa log bolte hain kyunki wo leads ya to unse.
Customer: Purani nayi hoti aapne hi mujhe di thi ki madam ye teen wo aa rakhi hain inquiry aap please check kar lo inko zarur kuch fruitful niklega. Maine kaha tha theek hai main ye teeno ko call karti hun aur teeno ko recording bhejti hun. Teeno mein se ek bhi hui to main use kar lungi. Kaha tha na maine?
Executive: Ma'am aisa nahi ho sakta ki matlab 5-10 minute aap time nahi de sakte bas consume karne ke liye daily basis pe consume karte rahiye. To usme se deal to ek na ek to niklega agar week mein ek do deal nikalta hai to ma'am wo month ka.
Customer: Main nahi likhta main consume karna chahti hun. Main client lana chahti hun. Hai na?
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Maine isiliye IndiaMART mein invest kiya tha. Hai na ye baat to true hai na? Ye to false news effect hoga.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul.
Customer: Par jab mujhe continuously maine try kiya maine ek specially banda bhi bitha tha iske liye pehle starting mein. To usse mere ko zero hi result aa raha hai 10 din mein bhi zero result hai ek frame de do ji ek ek frame ke liye factory nahi chala sakte na main.
Executive: Nahi wo to.
Customer: Ek minute dekho aap factory ko koi bolega ek khilona de do to nahi de sakte na aap.
Executive: Bilkul.
Customer: To wahi cheez hai na to sare ya to ek ke the ya fir fake the. Matlab do hi option tha ya to fake ya to fir one piece bas. Agar usne likha bhi hua hai na ki mujhe 1200 piece chahiye to bhi wo one hi piece chahiye tha usko.
Executive: To us time aap proper use karti thi uske baad bhi aisa aata tha?
Customer: Haan. Isliye to chhoda tha humne warna koi paise deke usko use nahi karega to it's like bewakoofi hai na wo to uski. Kyun use karega wo jab usne diye paise usne kuch soch ke diye the na ki haan bhai main aise aise karunga. Yahan se mera yahi benefit hoega. Meri ROI nikal jayegi sare jo maine paise lagaye mere nikal jayenge. Par wo ek mahina do mahina kar liya fir nahi kuch kuch bhi nahi hua to chhodna pada na ki ek bande ko bhi main kyun lagaun chalo paise lag gaye lag gaye IndiaMART pe. Ab main ek bande ka aur salary us pe ja raha hai. To wo aur add on mera investment ho raha hai to isliye maine usko chhoda tha.
Executive: Nahi yaar.
Customer: Aur fir jo bhi inquiry tha main khud hi mail se main dekh leti hun. Mujhe kuch bhi fruitful lagta nahi hai usme. Isliye lagta hai main usko call bhi kar leti hun.
Executive: Nahi calls bhi aate hain to uska bhi aap response nahi karte hain jaise last 30 days ki baat karun to 15 calls aayi hui hain theek hai. Usme se aapne bas 40% aapne call receive kara hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To jo calls aati hai na wo kya hota hai ki jisko requirement hoti hai wo direct calls karta hai aapke profile pe ja ke.
Customer: Bhai 40% mein maine do teen call utha li thi do teen callo mein na ye tha ki madam ek frame de do. Aur wo ek frame ke liye mujhe ek mahine se lage hue hain mere piche madam wo diya nahi aapne ek frame. Madam wo ek frame nahi diya. Yaar unko handle karna bada mushkil ho jata hai. Kyunki main hun director. Ya wo banda mujhe ek frame ke liye roz phone kar raha hai ki madam diya nahi. Main kya jawab dun usko ki bhai main kya karun kya bolde disrespect bhi nahi kar sakte na. Kyunki bacha hai wo bhi.
Executive: Haan wo number wo apne employee ka number aap add kar dijiye usme ki jo calls calls hote hain unhi ka.
Customer: Yahi to maine bola tha ki wo employee maine wahan se hata diya bhai. Maine kaha nahi is kaam ke liye nahi ho rehne do chhod do tum dusra kaam kar lo. Dusra product dekh lo. Ye main khud dekh lungi mujhe time lagega.
Executive: Nahi to kam se kam ye rehta na ki kisi bhi jo aapke under mein koi bhi kaam karta hai jo aapke product ke bare mein sab kuch pata hai unka number add kar denge to kam se kam ye hoga na ki jo calls aa rahi hain unko proper response karenge wo.
Customer: Apna kaam karte rahenge calls aa gayi to wo wo apne pe leke baat karenge ab aapke paas.
Executive: Mujhe ye kyun nahi samajh mein aa raha hai ki chhodna nahi karta main aur bhi client pe focus kar leta hun ye kyun nahi soch rahe ho tum?
Customer: Matlab?
Customer: Matlab aur bhi IndiaMART ke tumhare client ho na un pe focus kar lo na yaar. Tum mujhe chhod do mera naam hi block list mein dal do tum.
Executive: Ma'am wo hum wo kar hi nahi sakte agar karna hota to main kar deta kyunki dekhiye main dal dun. Hame bhi koi matlab nahi hota hai nahi aap kaise dalenge. Main keh raha hun ki hame bhi koi dekhiye hame bhi achcha nahi lagta hai call karke ye ye sari baatein karna kyunki dekhiye aapne jo recording bheja tha wo to main suna hi tha aapne do teen lead bhi consume kar raha tha aapne recording bheja tha to wo to mere samajh mein bhi aa gaya ki dekhiye aapke paas leads aa rahi hain lekin us tarah ki nahi aa rahi hain jaisa aapko chahiye. Customer fake aapke paas aa rahe hain. To main ye cheeze main apne manager se bhi discuss kiya tha unko sunaya bhi tha to unhone bola ki unko bolo ki proper use karein. Uske baad.
Customer: Proper roz inko sune matlab hai na?
Executive: Nahi nahi matlab.
Customer: Haan yahi to matlab hai proper roz aap inko suno aapne bas ek hi baar suna nahi nahi nahi aap roz suno.
Executive: Nahi ma'am mere kehne ka.
Customer: Main roz recording bhej dungi main bhagwan kasam. Nahi ma'am aapke paas abhi itna time nahi hota hai to isliye main keh raha tha ki apne.
Customer: Nahi nahi 10 minute main lagaungi to 10 minute mein jo bhi call hoengi main un sabki recording tumhe bhej dungi ye keh rahi hun main.
Executive: Nahi.
Customer: Theek hai?
Executive: Theek hai ma'am.
Customer: Chalo is tarah se try kar lete hain. Ek hafte mein jo bhi mere paas lead aati hai na mail pe theek hai ya call aati hai main un sabko uthaungi aur recording tumhare paas bhejungi. Usme se ek bhi mujhe 100 frame ki inquiry aa gayi agar mujhe ek 100 frame ki inquiry aa gayi na to main start kar lungi use karna okay?
Executive: Theek hai ma'am theek hai bilkul ek hafte ek baar try karte hain theek hai.
Customer: Okay so abhi abhi to aapke paas.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to discontinue IndiaMART service.

- Receiving fake inquiries and wasting time.

- Feels IndiaMART is not fruitful.



Resolution:

- Executive explained service usage is important.

- Agreed to try for a week with conditions.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send recordings for a week.

- Will start using if gets 100 frame inquiry.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- fake inquiries, service usage, time waste
